data.text: Of Mt. Morris, age 92, died Saturday, January 12, 2013, at her home. The funeral service will take place 11:00 am, on Monday, January 14, 2013, at the Martin Funeral, Cremation & Tribute Services in Mt. Morris. Ruth's family will be present at the funeral home on Monday to receive friends from 9:00 am until time of service at 11:00 am. Reverend Donald K. Gray will officiate with burial to follow at 3:00 pm at Warren Township Cemetery at in Coleman, Michigan. Ruth was born June 1, 1920, in Clare, Michigan, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Earl and Charlotte (Seaman) Robison. She attended High school in St Louis graduating in 1938. Ruth moved to Flint with her sister and worked for AC Spark Plug. She married Charles Wesley Mott in 1941. She was a member of the Mt. Morris Free Methodist Church. Left to cherish her memory, Children; Louella, Shirley and Ray; Grandchildren: Susan and Don, Beth and Bill, Sandy, Bev and Billy, Julie, Michael; Great-Grandchildren: Jamey and Joe, Nikki and Tony, Stephanie and Nick, Ian, Andrew, Sarah, Alyssa, Aaron; Great-Great-Grandchildren: Cameron, Bastion, Gabriel, Azalea, CeCe, Mason; and several nieces, nephews and cousins. Ruth was preceded in death by husband Wes, sister Velma, sons-in-law Max and Roger, and grandson Maxie.
